definition: to appoint/to assign
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The King of Yue, Gou Jian submitted and sued for peace.
sentences.chinese: 后越王勾践卧薪尝胆，任用文种和范蠡重振国政。

sentences.english: Two, the southwest side official of county appointed to practice the district and different policies.
sentences.chinese: 西南诸郡的边吏任用实行了区域性的不同政策。

sentences.english: He was knighted in 1514, and employed on various embassies.
sentences.chinese: 他在1514年受封爵士，被任用参与各种外交使团。

sentences.english: The appointment and responsibilities of consumer ombudsmen shall be regulated by the Executive Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 消费者保护官之任用及职掌，由行政院定之。

sentences.english: We must enforce stricter oversight over the whole process of selecting and appointing cadres.
sentences.chinese: 加强干部选拔任用工作全过程监督。

sentences.english: But it's the kind of Dr Strangelove you could see governments really using.
sentences.chinese: 但你看到的政府任用的却就是这种奇爱博士。

sentences.english: Even the foremen or first-level supervisors have a staffing responsibility .
sentences.chinese: 甚至领班或第一线的监督人员也有任用的责任。

sentences.english: At the same time, it also laid emphasis on the selection and appointment of teachers that is done through competition.
sentences.chinese: 同时，也注重对太学教师的选拔和任用，优胜劣汰。

sentences.english: Psychological tests are widely used to prevent misassignment of personnel.
sentences.chinese: 心理测验已广泛使用，以免人员任用不当。

sentences.english: The staff of IMCO shall be employed and managed by the personnel department of IMCO according to general rules.
sentences.chinese: 其他工作人员由人事部门依照层级管理的通则任用。

sentences.english: Ronard's appointment followed the abrupt departure of his predecessor.
sentences.chinese: 罗纳德是在他的前任突然离职后被任用的。

sentences.english: Two Dan Dynasties' southwest officials appointed characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 两汉西南边吏的选拔任用特点。

sentences.english: Once the employment, after five risks a probation period on gold.
sentences.chinese: 一经任用，试用期过后上五险一金。

definition: to appoint people according to their merits (idiom); appointment on the basis of ability and integrity
to put in an important position
expert at appointing people according to their abilities (idiom)/to put the right people in the right places
to recommend
to propose (for a job)/to nominate/to recommend
sage
to appoint people by favoritism (idiom); nepotism/corrupt appointment
to promote to a higher job/to select for promotion
to dismiss from office/to ban/to reject
to assist (usually a ruler)
select the best people for promotion
to hold power
autocracy/dictatorship
a genius/a talented person
muddleheaded
to promote/to reinstate (in a position or job)
